metadata.title: Implement Script Content Hashing and Cache Lookup

story.iWant: identical scripts cached to avoid rebuilding images

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given** API receives execution request 2. When** API calculates `script_hash = sha256(script_content)` 3. Then** API checks script_cache table for existing hash 4. And** if cache hit, skips Docker build and uses cached image 5. And** if cache miss, builds new image and stores hash
